import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../App.css' // import FileBase from 'react-file-base64' import axios from 'axios' class CreateMemories extends Component { constructor () { super() this.state = { title: '', creator:'', message:'', date:'', } } onChange = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const data = { title: this.state.title, creator: this.state.creator, message: this.state.message, productImage: this.state.productImage, date: this.state.date, } axios .post('http://localhost:5000/memories', data) .then(res => { this.setState({ title: '', creator:'', message:'', date:'', }) this.props.history.push('/') }) .catch(err => { console.log('Error in CreateMemories!') }) } render () { return (

) } } export default CreateMemories
